definition.value:
This profile is designed to work with NHS BSA Claim API.
It is compatible via transformation, this will be part of the virtually API.

The party to whom the professional services and/or products have been supplied or are being considered and for whom actual or forecast reimbursement is sought.
Example:
```json "patient": { "reference": "Patient/6d4e737a-b119-4a26-84af-ef6b84c7a7dd" }, ```

The period for which charges are being submitted.
Example:
```json "billablePeriod": { "start": "2021-07-01" }, ```

comment.value: This field is independent of the date of creation of the resource as it may reflect the creation date of a source document prior to digitization. Typically for claims all services must be completed as of this date.

definition.value:
The provider which is responsible for the claim, predetermination or preauthorization.
Example:
```json "provider": { "reference": "Organization/88aaaa45-c1a0-4576-bc60-adc32e8d51d9" }, ```
This should point to the Virtually FHIR Organization resource

This MUST reference a Virtually FHIR QuestionnaireResponse which contains the supporting claim information.
The definition of this QuestionnaireResponse is held in [Virtually BSA Questionnaire](https://simplifier.net/guide/Virtually-Healthcare-FHIR-API/Home/Questionnaire/NHSBSA-Claim-SuppportingInfo.page.md?version=current)
